title: Memory Forensics with Volatility
description: Analyze a memory dump to find hidden information using Volatility.
hints: Start by identifying the correct memory profile with Volatility.
Check for running processes and recently accessed files.
Use the strings plugin to search for text within the memory dump.
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of memory forensics.
Learn to use Volatility for analyzing memory dumps.
Identify and extract useful information from memory dumps.
